alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 8:53PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until midnight PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 853 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Downtown Las Vegas, The Strip, Paradise, East Las Vegas, Spring Valley, Green Valley, Nellis AFB, Sam Boyd Stadium, Enterprise, Aliante, Southern Highlands, Lone Mountain, Summerlin, The Motor Speedway, Mountains Edge, Anthem and Centennial Hills. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
